about_the_game:
Overview


Play as a rogue police officer on a desperate mission to find his missing daughter in a world where reality unravels. Explore eerie, twisted spaces filled with lurking horrors, uncovering dark truths that challenge what you believe. Each step may take you further from home, with no guarantee of return.

Key Features


  • Action-Adventure Gameplay: Engage in fast-paced combat and explore unsettling environments with hidden dangers.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience a world inspired by liminal spaces and psychological horror.

  • Deep Storyline: Follow a father’s emotional journey as he uncovers disturbing secrets.

  • Stunning Graphics: Powered by Unreal Engine with high-quality visuals and effects.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve puzzles that blend logic and intuition.

  • Dynamic Environments: Interact with your surroundings to uncover secrets and gain advantages.

  • Procedurally Generated Levels: Every playthrough offers unique, ever-changing environments filled with new challenges and surprises.

Can you rescue your daughter, or will you lose yourself in the nightmare?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: Play as a rogue cop searching for his missing daughter in a world where reality twists into nightmare. Explore procedurally generated levels, face lurking horrors, and uncover dark secrets in an ever-changing adventure where survival is the only way out.
